column4:
I'm done dealing with your incompetence.
Your final paycheck has been revoked due to theft from the register.
Don't bother using me as a reference.
Good luck affording rent and all those subscriptions now.
"What's up brother!\nTry our exclusive game and make MEGA MONEY!\nRules: Since our game offers a great opportunity
column5: we only allow players to have 3 turns per week to win BIG!\nDon't miss it!"

column4: "Your Streamflix subscription is auto-renewing!\nWe raised prices again because inflation is everyone's problem.\nBinge-watch shows we'll cancel after one season."
"Your Pixney Plus subscription is renewing.\nThe mouse demands his tribute.\nChildhood memories hit different when money's tight."
"Your Soundify Premium is renewing.\nJust the cost of 10 coffees! Or actual groceries.\nMusic is food for the soul
"Your Amazin Prime membership is renewing!\nRemember when this was affordable? Yeah
column5: neither do we lol.\nTwo-day shipping on regret and buyer's remorse."

column4: "Your Hoolu subscription renews today.\nEntertainment or savings? Your choice!\n(Spoiler: We know which one you'll pick)"
"Your HBOx subscription is renewing.\nPremium content deserves premium prices!\nWatch rich people solve problems with money you don't have."
"Your Pineapple Music subscription renews today.\nInvesting in vibes! Your bank account disagrees.\nYour curated playlists cost more than therapy would."
"Your ViewTube Premium is renewing!\nWho needs groceries when you can skip ads?\nYour feed knows you better than your family anyway."
"Your PlaySphere Plus is renewing.\nCan't put a price on fun! (It keeps going up though)\nYour K/D ratio is great
column5: your credit score... not so much."

column4: "Your Xblox Game Pass is renewing!\nBest deal in gaming! (We keep telling ourselves)\nYour gamerscore is higher than your savings balance."
"Your Chatter Nitro is renewing.\nInflation hits hard
column5: custom emojis hit different!\nServer boosts forever
